existing_features.title: Investigate and fix the 'Unable to save profile. Please try logging in again.' error that occurs when a new user (Lavanya, phone: 1237894561) tries to complete profile setup with the Ambulance Crew role selected on a new device

Add comprehensive error logging to the profile creation flow in both ProfileSetup.tsx and the backend createUserProfile function to capture the exact failure reason (authorization issues, validation errors, or backend state conflicts)

projectName: Fix profile creation error on new device login
